content:
ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler Delegate

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

A delegate type for client-side callbacks that are made to user code when the endpoints of a service change or an exception is encountered during the process of updating endpoint information at runtime.

Edit

In this Article

public delegate void ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler(FabricClient source, long handlerId, ServicePartitionResolutionChange args);Public Delegate Sub ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler(source As FabricClient, handlerId As Long, args As ServicePartitionResolutionChange)
Parameters
source
FabricClient FabricClient

A reference to the FabricClient instance receiving the endpoint change event.

handlerId
Int64 Int64

The ID returned from RegisterServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler(Uri, ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler) when the handler was registered.

args
ServicePartitionResolutionChange ServicePartitionResolutionChange

Event arguments containing details for the event. ServicePartitionResolutionChange.
